about_the_game:
All Whispering Tome is a captivating reading game where you explore a vast library of untold tales. Within its weathered pages lie stories whispered through time and space, both prophecies of futures yet to unfold and echoes of forgotten pasts.

As the reader, you embark on a captivating odyssey of discovery, where each turn of the page unlocks a new narrative tapestry. As you decipher these stories, the narratives evolve, even the words may or may not shift before your eyes. All the hints are hidden within the ever-evolving nature of these stories.

Lose yourself in these mesmerizing tales and uncover the stories beyond the stories in the All Whispering Tome.

Gameplay

Read the books and look for anything unusual. The definition of unusual may vary from story to story. Also be careful to notice any changes in the stories you've already read. The All Whispering Tome may or may not change shape and content before your eyes in any moment. You must read carefully to uncover the stories beyond the stories.

content_descriptors.notes: Game is text based with some pictures to support narravites. Topics may not be appropriate for all ages but not exceptionally out of ordinary.
